textAfterTable: City-data.com crime rate counts serious crimes and violent crime more heavily. It adjusts for the number of visitors and daily workers commuting into cities. According to our research of Maine and other state lists there were 11 registered sex offenders living in Pittsfield, Maine as of August 03, 2015. The ratio of number of residents in Pittsfield to the number of sex offenders is 379 to 1.
